title: pbe sign up page not working
body: sooo i just got accepted to the pbe servers but when i go to them and try to sign up, an error comes up. pls give me feedback on any help

replies.body: What kind of error are you seeing when you try to sign up for PBE? If you can take a screenshot or describe what happens then I can see what might be going on.
i see a iblitzcrank and it says something is hextechly wrong

That kind of error typically pops up due to some kind of routing error between your network and the webpage. Let's try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) to see if that helps!
I am having the same issue, been like this for weeks trying to sign up. And this is also a brand new computer

i have the same problem and i cleared by browser history and cookies but im still getting the same error? Is there anything else I can do to help this problem? I've also tried this at multiple houses so it's not the router or modem.
